scripts.build:chrome: esbuild src/background.ts src/contentScript.ts --bundle --outdir=dist/chrome --format=iife && copyfiles -u 2 src/chrome/manifest.json dist/chrome/ && copyfiles -u 1 src/index.css src/icons/*.png dist/chrome/
scripts.build:firefox: esbuild src/background.ts src/contentScript.ts --bundle --outdir=dist/firefox --format=iife && copyfiles -u 2 src/firefox/manifest.json dist/firefox/ && copyfiles -u 1 src/index.css src/icons/*.svg dist/firefox/
